name: mining helmet
description: This is a mining helmet with a heavy duty LED flashlight.  Using this will turn the flashlight on and provide light, assuming it is charged with batteries.

name: mining helmet (on)
description: This is a mining helmet with a heavy duty LED flashlight.  The flashlight is turned on, and continually draining its batteries.  Use it to turn it off.

name: game watch
description: A waterproof digital watch with a built-in electronic game system, powered by standard batteries.  Activate to play.

name: fedora
description: A high-crowned, wide-brimmed, sable colored fedora.  Its brim helps keep the sun out of your eyes.  The perfect hat for treasure hunting.

name: pair of thermal electric socks
description: This is a pair of socks with internal battery-powered heating elements.  Use it to turn it on.

name: pair of thermal electric socks (on)
description: This is a pair of socks with internal battery-powered heating elements.  They are currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn them off.

name: thermal electric suit
description: This is a full-body suit of thin thermal underwear equipped with internal battery-powered heating elements.  Use it to turn it on.

name: thermal electric suit (on)
description: This is a full-body suit of thin thermal underwear equipped with internal battery-powered heating elements.  It is currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.

name: pair of thermal electric gloves
description: This is a pair of gloves with internal battery-powered heating elements.  Use it to turn it on.

name: pair of thermal electric gloves (on)
description: This is a pair of gloves with internal battery-powered heating elements.  They are currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn them off.

name: thermal electric balaclava
description: This is a snug cloth mask with internal battery-powered heating elements.  Use it to turn it on.

name: thermal electric balaclava (on)
description: This is a snug cloth mask with internal battery-powered heating elements.  It is are currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.

name: head torch
description: This is an LED head torch with an adjustable strap so as to be comfortably worn on your head or attached to your helmet.  Use it to turn it on.

use_action.msg: You turn the head torch on.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The head torch batteries are dead.

name: head torch (on)
description: This is an LED head torch with an adjustable strap so as to be comfortably worn on your head or attached to your helmet.  It is turned on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.

name: survivor head torch
description: This is a custom made LED head torch reinforced to be more durable, brighter, and with a larger and more efficient battery pack. The adjustable strap allows it to be comfortably worn on your head or attached to your helmet.  Use it to turn it on.

use_action.msg: You turn the survivor head torch on.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The survivor head torch batteries are dead.

name: survivor head torch (on)
description: This is a custom made LED head torch reinforced to be more durable, brighter, and with a larger and more efficient battery pack. The adjustable strap allows it to be comfortably worn on your head or attached to your helmet. It is turned on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.

name: firefighter PBA mask
description: A full-face mask commonly used by firefighters.  The battery-powered protective breathing apparatus provides excellent protection from smoke, flame, and other dangers.  Use it to turn it on.

name: firefighter PBA mask (on)
description: A full-face mask commonly used by firefighters.  The battery-powered protective breathing apparatus provides excellent protection from smoke, flame, and other dangers.  It is turned on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.

name: RM13 combat armor
description: Internally powered by a maximum of ten plutonium fuel cells, this full-body suit of sleek black military armor represents the pinnacle of Rivtech's non-rigid powered armor technology.  Use it to turn it on.

name: RM13 combat armor (on)
description: Internally powered by a maximum of ten plutonium fuel cells, this full-body suit of sleek black military armor represents the pinnacle of Rivtech's non-rigid powered armor technology.  It is turned on, and continually draining power.  Use it to turn it off.

name: rebreather mask
description: A mask worn over your mouth which, when loaded with the proper filters, recycles your exhaled breath for rebreathing while underwater.  Use it to turn it on.

name: rebreather mask (on)
description: A mask worn over your mouth which, when loaded with the proper filters, recycles your exhaled breath for rebreathing while underwater.  It is turned on, and continually consuming its filter.  Use it to turn it off.

name: XL rebreather mask
description: A mask worn over your mouth which, when loaded with the proper filters, recycles your exhaled breath for rebreathing while underwater.  This model has been expanded substantially and can accommodate exotic anatomy.  Use it to turn it on.

name: XL rebreather mask (on)
description: A mask worn over your mouth which, when loaded with the proper filters, recycles your exhaled breath for rebreathing while underwater.  This model has been expanded substantially and can accommodate exotic anatomy.  It is turned on, and continually consuming its filter.  Use it to turn it off.

name: pair of light amp goggles
description: A pair of battery-powered goggles that amplify ambient light, allowing you to see in the dark.  Use it to turn them on.

name: pair of light amp goggles (on)
description: A pair of battery-powered goggles that amplify ambient light, allowing you to see in the dark.  It is turned on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn them off.

name: pair of infrared goggles
description: A pair of battery-powered goggles that grant infrared vision, allowing you to see warm-blooded creatures in the dark.  Use it to turn them on.

name: pair of infrared goggles (on)
description: A pair of battery-powered goggles that grant infrared vision, allowing you to see warm-blooded creatures in the dark.  Use it to turn them off.

name: wearable RX12 jet injector
description: This is a modified RX12 jet injector which can be worn on the body.  A label on the side warns against using more than two doses per hour.

name: RX11 stimulant delivery system
description: The Rivtech RX11 stimulant delivery system is a jet autoinjector system worn on the user's body.  A simple press of its activator injects powerful chemical stimulants into the bloodstream without using a needle.

name: survivor divemask
description: A custom-built, armored rebreather mask that covers the face and eyes.  It provides excellent protection from harm as well providing breathing gas while underwater.  Use it to turn it on.

name: survivor divemask (on)
description: A custom-built, armored rebreather mask that covers the face and eyes.  It provides excellent protection from harm as well providing breathing gas while underwater.  It is turned on, and continually consuming its filter.  Use it to turn it off.

name: XL survivor divemask
description: A custom-built, armored rebreather mask that covers the face and eyes.  It provides excellent protection from harm as well providing breathing gas while underwater.  Use it to turn it on.

name: XL survivor divemask (on)
description: A custom-built, armored rebreather mask that covers the face and eyes regardless of your state of mutation.  It provides excellent protection from harm as well providing breathing gas while underwater.  It is turned on, and continually consuming its filter.  Use it to turn it off.

name: folded poncho
description: A folded lightweight plastic rain poncho with a hood.  Use it to unfold for use.

name: unfolded poncho
description: A lightweight plastic rain poncho with a hood.  Use it to fold for storage.

name: folded emergency blanket
description: A folded blanket made of space-age materials that covers your most important body parts.  Use it to unfold for use.

name: emergency blanket
description: A blanket made of space-age material that covers your most important body parts.  Use it to fold for storage.

name: radiation biomonitor
description: A small battery-powered biometric safety device worn on the wrist.  Activate to check your current level of radiation exposure.

name: survivor utility belt
description: A custom-built leather utility belt covered with straps and pouches containing many useful hand tools and a sheath to carry a knife.  Durable and carefully crafted to be comfortable to wear.  Activate to sheathe/draw a weapon.

name: hairpin
description: A plain hairpin to keep your hair in place.

name: towel
description: This is a fluffy and large towel.  It could be used to dry yourself.  Any person that can travel the length and breadth of the apocalypse, rough it, slum it, struggle against terrible odds, win through and still know where their towel is, is clearly a force to be reckoned with.

name: towel
description: This is a large, sopping wet towel.  If you wait a little bit, it should dry out.  Don't panic.

name: soiled towel
description: This is a large towel, covered in a thick, gooey liquid.  You'll need to wash it in some water to make it usable again.  Don't panic.

name: straw fedora
description: Straw fedora hat, comfortable and stylish.  Its brim helps keep the sun out of your eyes.

name: simple patchwork scarf
description: A simple and light cloth scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.

name: simple patchwork scarf (loose)
description: A simple and light cloth scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.

name: long patchwork scarf
description: A very long light cloth scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.

name: long patchwork scarf (loose)
description: A very long light cloth scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.

name: knit scarf
description: A long knitted cotton scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.

name: knit scarf (loose)
description: A long knitted cotton scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.

name: long knit scarf
description: A really long knitted cotton scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.

name: long knit scarf (loose)
description: A really long knitted cotton scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.

name: wool scarf
description: A long wool scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.

name: wool scarf (loose)
description: A long wool scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.

use_action.msg: You wrap your scarf a bit tighter.

name: long wool scarf
description: A really long wool scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.

name: long wool scarf (loose)
description: A really long wool scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.

name: fur scarf
description: A long fur scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.

name: fur scarf (loose)
description: A long fur scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.

use_action.msg: You wrap your scarf a bit tighter.

name: long fur scarf
description: A really long fur scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.

name: long fur scarf (loose)
description: A really long fur scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.

name: thermal electric outfit
description: This suit of thin thermal underwear covers you from head to toe and is equipped with internal battery-powered heating elements.  Use it to turn it on.

name: thermal electric outfit (on)
description: This suit of thin thermal underwear covers you from head to toe and is equipped with internal battery-powered heating elements.  It is currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn it off.

name: ski mask

use_action.msg: You adjust your ski mask for less warmth.

description: A warm wool mask that protects the head and face from cold.  It has a full face opening that can be adjusted to set how much is exposed.

name: ski mask (open)

use_action.msg: You adjust your ski mask for more warmth.

description: A warm wool mask that protects the head and face from cold.  It has a full face opening that can be adjusted to set how much is exposed.

name: whistle
description: A simple metal whistle, with a cord to wear it around your neck.

name: harmonica with a holder

descriptions: You produce a happy tune on your harmonica.

description: A harmonica with a holder, so that you can play it without a free hand.

name: acoustic guitar

descriptions: You strum a few chords on your guitar.
You pluck a few notes on your guitar.
You play a slow blues-y tune on your guitar.

description: A simple wooden acoustic guitar with a strap so you can wear it around, even when not playing.

name: bagpipes

descriptions: Your pipes drone loudly as you strike a battle hymn from the chanter.
Your pipes drone a slow and piercing dirge.
You strike a lively quick step march on your pipes.

description: A traditional musical instrument using enclosed reeds fed from a reservoir of air contained within a leather bag.  It has a strap so you can wear it around, even when not playing.

name: tuba

descriptions: You play a little tune on your tuba.
You play a ditty on your tuba.
You play a marching tune on your tuba.

//~: ol' is an informal short-form for old, and here is part of big-ol as large-and-cumbersome.
description: A big ol' tuba.  Much easier to play when wearing.

name: saxophone

descriptions: You play a little tune on your saxophone.
You play a soulful jazz piece on your sax.
You play a quick, energetic ditty on your sax.

description: A brass-plated alto saxophone with a neck strap, so you can wear it while playing.
